serves.comment:
This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.

This food contains capsaicin, a natural ingredient which gives its spicy flavour and can trigger heartburn and abdominal pain in some individuals with IBS. Limit intake if IBS symptoms occur after ingestion of spicy foods.

food.name: Перец, кайенский перец, острый, сушеный, молотый

serves.comment: This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.\n\nThis food also contains capsaicin, a natural ingredient which gives its spicy flavour and can trigger heartburn and abdominal pain in some individuals with IBS. Limit intake if IBS symptoms occur after ingestion of spicy foods. Please note that the 'green' traffic light rating system allows you to eat multiple serves of ‘green’ foods per meal.  Nutritional guidelines recommend that on average per day you should eat at least 5 serves of vegetables and 2 serves of fruits.

serves.comment:
This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.

Please note that the 'green' traffic light rating system allows you to eat multiple serves of ‘green’ foods per meal. Nutritional guidelines recommend that on average per day you should eat at least 5 serves of vegetables and 2 serves of fruits.
serves.title: 1 порция (1 чашка)
